steps.name: Given I login via API with email "" and password ""
And I open the Summa homepage
And I should see the Summa home page
When I create a new client with clientType "Company"
And I click create new client button
And I click the clients button
And I search for created client
Then I see created client in search results
Given I login via API with email "" and password ""
And I open the Summa homepage
And I should see the Summa home page
When I create a new client with clientType "Company"
And I click create new client button
